name: CHORIZO, BEEF & PEPPERONI
description: Spanish style chorizo, NZ ground beef, pepperoni, capsicum and stretchy mozzarella cheese topped with oregano and fresh sliced spring onion

name: ITALIAN DELI
description: Spanish style chorizo, pepperoni, fire roasted peppers, Italian sausage, olives and red onion topped with stretchy mozzarella cheese and oregano

name: EIGHT MEATS
description: The ultimate combination of your favourite meaty toppings! Succulent chicken, pepperoni, NZ ground beef, Manuka smoked ham, pork & fennel sausage, Italian sausage, chorizo with crispy rasher bacon

name: GARDEN VEG WITH BUTTER SAUCE
description: Creamy feta, fresh spinach, capsicum, tomato, red onion and stretchy mozzarella on a creme fraiche base topped with fresh spring onion and an Indian butter sauce

name: SPICY BBQ PORK & BACON
description: Lots of stretchy mozzarella cheese, pork & fennel sausage, crispy rasher bacon, pineapple, jalapenos, red onion on a BBQ sauce base, topped with fresh spring onion & a BBQ sauce swirl

name: SUPREME
description: Pepperoni, rasher bacon, capsicum, ground beef, Italian sausage, mushroom, pineapple, topped with oregano & fresh sliced spring onion

name: BBQ MEATLOVERS
description: Rasher bacon, pepperoni, Manuka smoked ham, ground beef, Italian sausage & mozzarella, topped with a BBQ sauce swirl

name: DOUBLE BACON CHEESEBURGER
description: Ground beef, rasher bacon, mozzarella on a BBQ base topped with mayonnaise

name: GODFATHER
description: Pepperoni, Italian sausage, fresh tomato, capsicum, olives, mozzarella & oregano on a tomato & garlic sauce base
